me.lihq.game.screen.elements

Class SpeechBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.lihq.game.screen.elements.SpeechBox

  • public class SpeechBox
extends java.lang.Object
    SpeechBox class Used for rendering box containing text and buttons on screen

    Usage: SpeechBox sb = new SpeechBox(..) sb.render();

    Note: add to InputMultiplexer if using with other UI elements.
